title: Preset Configuration
description: Schema for yt-dlp preset configurations used in YTPTube.

id.description: Unique identifier for the preset (UUID or slug).

folder.description: Default download folder for this preset.

template.description: Default output template for this preset.

cli.description: yt-dlp command line options for this preset.

default.description: Whether this preset is a default preset.

examples.name: default
examples.description: Default preset for yt-dlp. It will download whatever yt-dlp decides is the best quality for the video and audio.

examples.name: Audio Only
examples.description: This preset is designed to download only the audio of the video. It will extract the audio, add chapters, metadata, and thumbnail.
